last_episode_to_air.name: What's Changing?
last_episode_to_air.overview: As women reflect on their journeys across decades of hip-hop, they spotlight the sisterhood in rap — and celebrate being stronger together than apart.

name: Ladies First: A Story of Women in Hip-Hop
original_name: Ladies First: A Story of Women in Hip-Hop
overview: Rappers, writers and experts detail the influence of women on hip-hop music and culture in this docuseries honoring the trailblazers and game-changers.

episodes.name: Shaping Hip-Hop
episodes.overview: Sha-Rock, Roxanne Shanté and MC Lyte claim space for women in the early days of hip-hop, delivering rhymes with unique perspectives and bold messages.

episodes.name: What Are They Up Against?
episodes.overview: In a male-dominated industry, women face criticism, colorism and other obstacles as they set out to define their own narratives, both on wax and off.

episodes.name: What Have They Lost?
episodes.overview: Artists, producers and writers recount stories of abuse and erasure while working in hip-hop amid contract disputes, acts of violence and more.

episodes.name: What's Changing?
episodes.overview: As women reflect on their journeys across decades of hip-hop, they spotlight the sisterhood in rap — and celebrate being stronger together than apart.
